It is Alarm system for the experts, Plays an audio when question appears on the screen.

NEW: Now you can stop the music in between or if u missed the alarm it will ring again in 90 seconds.

Active Features:
----->Chegg Expert Auto Refresh
----->Alarm On Question
----->Music Pause
----->Search Question on Google
----->Bot Links for solutions from Google search
----->Free Bartleby , Solutioninn, Chegg:2-3Rs/Answer
----->One Click Skip

Upcoming Features:
----->Auto Skip Question
----->Auto Accept Question
----->Image to Text Converter
----->Plagiarism Correction
